Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different types of habitats: one on land and one in water.
The student can observe and draw various living things, such as plants and animals, found in each habitat.
The student can compare and show differences by drawing how the plants and animals in each habitat are unique.
The student can demonstrate understanding of patterns by showing the diversity of life in both the land and water habitats through their drawings.
The student can label their drawings to clearly identify the types of habitats and the living things they include.
